page.title: 04South Charnwood High School
page.content: In 1984 Mr.Etchingham and his staff organised thirty{school trips,}such as, Austria, France, as well as local visits to Loughborough and Leicester. The latest addition to Charnwood was a sports hall, it was opened in May 1984. The playground and field total some twenty four acres. There are twenty six teaching rooms in the school including a few{mobile classrooms. There are forty different periods for lessons each week at Charnwood. { Punishments}in Charnwood are very few. Here are some of them.You may be kept in at lunch, be suspended, given jobs to do or Mr.Etchingham will tell your parents what you did wrong.
